rpo.enchantmentOutline.glintColor.toolti: Change the color of the enchantment glint.
rpo.enchantmentOutline.armor.tooltip: Enable or disable the outline on worn armor. (WARNING: QUITE BUGGY, NOT VISIBLE F5)
rpo.enchantmentOutline.guiOutline.toolti: Enable or disable the outline in the GUI.
rpo.enchantmentOutline.compatibility.too: Options for compatibility with other resource packs.
Compatibility for packs that change most tools.
rpo.enchantmentOutline.compatibility.mac: Compatibility for packs that change the Mace.
rpo.enchantmentOutline.compatibility.shi: Compatibility for packs that change the Shield.
rpo.enchantmentOutline.compatibility.xPB: Compatibility for packs that change Bottles O' Enchanting.
rpo.enchantmentOutline.compatibility.gol: Compatibility for packs that change the Golden Helmet.
rpo.enchantmentOutline.compatibility.boo: Compatibility for packs that change Enchanted Books.
rpo.enchantmentOutline.compatibility.foo: Compatibility for packs that change food items (Enchanted Golden Apples).
